body:

Me: They're black squares.
Cool. But i don't see how I'm supposed to enjoy this.
LUL
excuse me but i need to throw up... bleerrrrrghhhh
This kis kinda fucked up but you really cant judge a persons fetishes
Why? This is incredibly fucked up, but I understand why some might like it? I think. I don't know

@jdognasty "sticks and stones" my friend. I dislike NTR, Guro & Snuff sure. But I won't kink shame (and if I do, it's usually at an asshole who is trying to provoke me. Like an Atheist who only starts insulting a person's faith when that same person decided to make shit personal. The fight is between those two, otherwise the "said example" Atheist has no problem with others of that faith as long as they don't make themselves "his and other's" problems". Like what you like and don't let others shame you for it. Plus it's not you guys fault the artists are getting attracted to your fetish because some of you are willing to "pay alot" to have them "cater" to it more. I'm mad at Takeda for exampling going to the "dark side" but my anger is with him not you guys.

I'm sick of people telling me and others to kill ourselves and that we deserve to be tortured because we masturbate to something that isn't missionary while holding hands. Nobody is hurt in the production or consumption of these, chill the fuck out dude.

.....I'm curious about why NTR lovers are going into "Vanilla Fags whining again LOL" mode on a non-NTR story?....do you..have you guys gotten so use to insulting at every turn that your going into other stories just to fuck with Vanilla Lovers! I'm not being insulting or demeaning here, just wanting to point out that you guys are suffering "he who fights monsters" syndrome where you've become the monster "everyone" dislikes now.
This shit traumatized me. Before I realize it just over-exaggerated version of human trafficking.
Sick sick sick
fucking loled at this normalfag typing shitload of words just to bitch about this manga
So good, and the vanilla tears in the comments make it even better
Time to commit toasterbath
Its 4:35 am now and i want to sleep now bye

I like people who say: It's just drawing; Why you taking this so seriously; Vanillafag; etc. 1st: You have to be really broken to draw this (I mean REALLY, 1 page takes a few hours and all you're drawing is kids being raped, tortured and their babies killed)
2nd: People who like this probably have some problems with life coz this shit is gonna impact some people even tho "It's just drawing"(Well bruh, ur a sick motherfucker that needs to die, no hope for u)
3rd: Imagine there is a lot of ppl like this. 
Taking hal, hana hook, etc. I wonder why these people are popular ? I mean who would get off from someone else's suffering ? Mentally broken people with no social life. I'm not gonna say "look for help or therapist" Imma gonna say commit suicide bitch. 
Personal note: hal is woman, who was asked if she would use her experience from giving birth in her manga, said yes - burn at stake witch-whore

God is not dead if you are wondering.  Its just sick depraved people having a bad day and they draw out their frustration  by creating such doujins just to fuck with us these are the real scums,  and a black mark to lots of good,  passionate,  extreme good effortionist Artists out there!
@WhiteDemon16 Dude, its a time skip simple as that, also for Mio kid...she said in page 33 that it was grounded up and placed inside the charm she sold the guy.
im confused at pg 30 miyako has already given birth but at pg 31 she's ABOUT to give birth. alos wut happened to mio's baby?
